price: 29. (It will be said to the disbelievers): "Depart you to that which you used to deny!
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
